articles.title: Why Web3 Is More Than Just Cryptocurrency
articles.description: Web3 is changing how we think about ownership, privacy, and data. Here's what you need to know.
articles.content:
Web3 isn't just about crypto. It's about decentralization. Apps built on blockchain give users real control over their data and digital identity. DAOs and NFTs are just the beginning.

In 2025, Web3 will expand into social platforms, data ownership, and even decentralized finance that's user-first.

articles.title: Top 5 AI Tools to Boost Productivity in 2025
articles.description: Discover how AI tools are helping developers, writers, and designers work smarter and faster.
articles.content:
In 2025, AI tools like ChatGPT, Midjourney, and GitHub Copilot are helping millions save time by automating tasks.

Whether you write, code, or design, there's an AI tool built for you.

articles.title: The Rise of Edge Computing in IoT Devices
articles.description: Edge computing allows devices to process data locally, making IoT faster and smarter.
articles.content:
With the explosion of IoT devices, cloud computing alone isn't fast enough. Edge computing solves this by processing data directly on the device or nearby â€” reducing latency and improving efficiency.

This is essential in self-driving cars, smart homes, and wearables where real-time data is critical.
